resources.string: Zakat fitrah is mandatory for every Muslim who can afford it. The amount is rice or staple food weighing 2.5 kg or 3.5 liters per person.

"Nawaitu an uhrija zakat fitri anna wa an jami i maa yalzamuni nafqu tuhun syiar a an far dzolillahi ta ala. Meaning : I intend to pay zakaah on myself and on all those on whom I am obliged to provide for them according to sharee'ah, fard for the sake of Allah, may He be exalted. "
"Name of Zakat Payer: %1$s Number of People: %2$s Total zakat paid: Rp.%3$.2f "
"Amount of zakat to be paid: Rp.%1$.2f "
